name: Arcfest
description:
Settle the score against someone in Arcfest, a fast-paced one-versus-one brawler where you smack and whack your way to victory, as you fight to stay inside a quick closing zone.

Do you have what it takes to win?

—

CONTROLS

For Player 1:

  • Forward — W
  • Steering — A and D
  • Slash Attack — H
  • Missile Attack — J

For Player 2:

  • Forward — Up Arrow
  • Steering — Left and Right Arrow
  • Slash Attack — Numpad 2
  • Missile Attack — Numpad 3

Arcfest is a local multiplayer game, but you can use software like Parsec to play online.

—

There are no plans currently to expand Arcfest out of it's prototype stage, although this is not a hard no.
